title: Mohammed Shia' Al Sudani
summary: Mohammed Shia’ Sabbar Al-Sudani  (Arabic: محمد شياع السوداني; born 1970) is an Iraqi politician who is serving as the Prime Minister of Iraq since 27 October 2022. He was the Human Rights Minister of Iraq in the Council of Ministers of Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki from 2010 until October 2014. He was the Governor of Maysan Province between 2009 and 2010.
